prompts: Create a playful, small Pokemon that resembles a cute, spiky creature with a blue hue.
Imagine a Pokemon that can thrive in forest and grassland environments, with a distinct poison-type feature.
Design a two-toned Pokemon that has a round shape and a spiky back, perfect for a fantasy game.
Generate a tiny creature with light blue fur and red spots, showcasing its playful personality.
Show me a Pokemon that looks adorable and has a unique combination of poison and normal types.
Make a small Pokemon with a round body and distinctive features, perfect for trainers who love cuteness.
Give me a description of a Pokemon that has a rare habitat, combining elements of forest and cave.
